value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|It turns out that Zacharias is fine after
all. What a relief!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|$w0|Yes, but... Why did he leave again
before we had a chance to meet?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I don't know, but he must have had
a reason, judging by what
$Nu told us.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Don't worry! Even if Zacharias is in
hiding, we do have a way to speak
with him now...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|We do? Since when?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I managed to get my hands on
something special while we were in
the World of Radiance.$k$pIt's called a sending stone—it's a
magical stone that lets you talk
to someone far away.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|And you believe we can use this to
speak with Zacharias?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Usually, the person you want to
talk to also needs to have a stone...$k$pBut we can use it as the catalyst for a
magical rite in the World of Shadows,
which is where we're headed next.$k$p$EFace_Smile|As long as he's alive, Zacharias will
be able to hear us...even if he's
asleep!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|That's fantastic, Commander Anna!
What are we waiting for? Let's talk to
Zacharias right away!$k$p

$WmMPID_セリカ,ch10_08_Cellica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|My name is Celica. I'm a childhood
friend of Alm's, and...I don't want to
fight you.$k$pSadly, though, it seems I cannot
resist this contract. I'm sorry.$k$pAll I can do is fight, and pray that your
strength will be enough to free us.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|It seems the Heroes of this world
are already under the control of
Embla, which means...$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You again? I tire of meeting like this.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Prince Bruno!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Guh! Leave...now. Get in my way,
and...I...will kill...you.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Wait!$k$p$Sbs150|
